amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 118-705 to add engaging in efforts to interfere in U.S. federal, state, and local elections to List of Qualifications for "SANCTIONABLE CONDUCT.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amo amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Amo amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
